SEARCH
Module Qilletni.qilletni.api.main
Package is.yarr.qilletni.api.lib.persistence

Interface PackageConfig

public interface PackageConfig
A persistent configuration file for each package.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<String>
    get(String key)
    Get a value from the configuration.
    Map<String,String>
    getAll()
    Get all the values in the configuration.
    String
    getOrThrow(String key)
    Get a value from the configuration, or throw an exception if it does not exist.
    void
    loadConfig()
    Load the configuration from the file system if it has not been read in yet.
    void
    reloadConfig()
    Load the configuration from the file system, regardless of if it has been read in yet.
    void
    remove(String key)
    Remove a value from the configuration.
    void
    saveConfig()
    Save the configuration to the file system.
    void
    set(String key, String value)
    Set a value in the configuration.

  • Method Details

    • loadConfig

      void loadConfig()
      Load the configuration from the file system if it has not been read in yet.

    • reloadConfig

      void reloadConfig()
      Load the configuration from the file system, regardless of if it has been read in yet. This replaces all previously read in values.

    • saveConfig

      void saveConfig()
      Save the configuration to the file system.

    • get

      Optional<String> get(String key)
      Get a value from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to get the value for
      Returns:
      The value for the key, if it exists

    • getOrThrow

      String getOrThrow(String key)
      Get a value from the configuration, or throw an exception if it does not exist.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to get the value for
      Returns:
      The value for the key

    • set

      void set(String key, String value)
      Set a value in the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to set the value for
      value - The value to set

    • remove

      void remove(String key)
      Remove a value from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to remove the value for

    • getAll

      Map<String,String> getAll()
      Get all the values in the configuration.
      Returns:
      A map of all the values in the configuration
